#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

#define REP(i,n) for((i)=0;(i)<(int)(n);(i)++)
#define foreach(c,itr) for(__typeof((c).begin()) itr=(c).begin();itr!=(c).end();itr++)

typedef long long ll;
typedef long double ld;

int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
//    freopen("1.in", "rt", stdin);
    //freopen("1.out","wt",stdout);
#endif
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--) {
    	int n;
    	cin >> n;
    	int mx = -1e9;
    	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    		int x;
    		cin >> x;
    		mx = max(mx, x);
		}
    	cout << mx << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
